author: cnbc.com
title: Calise Partners Acquires PrintAbilities
text:
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Dallas’ Calise Partners has completed an Asset Purchase of PrintAbilities, a technology-based print, promotional and wearables company utilizing a network of production facilities throughout the U.S. and Canada. Calise Partners, the integrated marketing agency behind AdScience®, provides marketing support for a distributed network of more than 1,200 franchise and company-owned locations for its clients.
PrintAbilities specializes in printing and promotional design, production and fulfillment for a wide range of companies, managing everything from direct mail and sales collateral to promotional products and wearables. The company is built on advanced web-to-print technology that allows its clients to efficiently deploy both national and local marketing programs.
“The PrintAbilities acquisition will immediately be accretive to our agency’s direct mail and production capabilities,” said Taylor Calise, Chief Operating Officer. “Their ability to quickly deploy web-to-print portals is not only unique, but also presents a tremendous benefit to our clients with large multi-location operations.”
Calise anticipates the agency to continue the rapid growth it has sustained for the last two years, which will be accelerated by the capabilities and efficiencies introduced with the PrintAbilities acquisition. The company will continue to operate under the PrintAbilities name.
“Calise Partners provides us with tremendous resources, and their AdScience® platform adds a data science component to our service offering that will be extremely beneficial to our clients,” added Philip Vivier, Chief Operating Officer of PrintAbilities.
ABOUT CALISE PARTNERS
Calise Partners is the Integrated marketing agency that has Advertising Down to a Science™. The agency’s powerful AdScience™ Data Management Platform maintains a single source of truth for clients’ data, allowing for unparalleled optimization of the marketing programs that are most effective in generating new customers. Headquartered in Dallas, TX, Calise Partners provides comprehensive marketing, creative, advertising, paid and social media, public relations and database marketing services. For more information visit www.CalisePartners.com .
